mapper.update: create table ${siteId}_click_hit_keyword ( timeId varchar(11), keyword varchar(128), clickType varchar(30), hit int, primary key (timeId, keyword, clickType) ) ${option}
create index timeId_${siteId}_click_hit_keyword on ${siteId}_click_hit_keyword(timeId, keyword, clickType)
mapper.select: select timeId, keyword, clickType, hit from ${siteId}_click_hit_keyword where timeId = ''
mapper.insert: insert ignore into ${siteId}_click_hit_keyword (timeId, keyword, clickType, hit) values (#{timeId}, #{keyword}, #{clickType}, #{hit})
